title: Report #001 — Liquidity Risk / Suspicious Pattern
summary: Initial checks suggest elevated risk indicators. Users should verify LP lock, ownership status, and contract permissions before interacting.

title: Report #002 — Wallet Activity Review
summary: Observed repeated clustered transactions in a short window. Further verification recommended with TX links and wallet relationship mapping.

title: Report #003 — Safety Reminder
summary: Reminder: Never trust claims without evidence. Verify contract source, taxes, admin privileges, and distribution concentration.
